it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.comm

Class SpooledAsyncChannel.FutureReply

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.comm.SpooledAsyncChannel.FutureReply
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Future<Reply>
    Enclosing class:
    SpooledAsyncChannel

    public static class SpooledAsyncChannel.FutureReply
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Future<Reply>
    This class implements a Future over a Reply object specifically tailored for the SpooledAsyncChannel outer class. Access is thread-safe and the hosted reply is stored once and returned at each call of the get() method. Calls to get() and get(long, TimeUnit) are blocking when the reply is yet to be received; subsequent calls return immediately. Cancellation is not supported.
    See Also:
    Future
